importomics 0.99.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • importomics

Get/Set occupancies

occupancies.Rd

Get / Set occupancies matrix

occupancies(object)

# S4 method for SummarizedExperiment
occupancies(object)

occupancies(object) <- value

# S4 method for SummarizedExperiment,matrix
occupancies(object) <- value

# S4 method for SummarizedExperiment,numeric
occupancies(object) <- value

Arguments

object

SummarizedExperiment
value

occupancy matrix (features x samples)

Value

occpuancy matrix (get) or updated object (set)

Examples

proteinfile <- download_data('differentiation.proteinGroups.txt')
phosphofile <- download_data('differentiation.phosphoSites.txt')
object <- read_phosphosites(phosphofile, proteinfile)

#> 	Read: ~/importomicscache/datasets/differentiation/differentiation.proteinGroups.txt
#> 		Rm 70 features with missing 'feature_id' values
#> 	Prepare samples
#> 		Standardize snames: Ratio M/L normalized STD(L).EM00(M).EM01(H).R1  ->  STD(L).EM00(M).EM01(H).R1{M/L}
#> 		Demultiplex snames: STD(L).EM00(M).EM01(H).R1{M/L}  ->  EM00_STD.R1
#> 		Uniquify snames: BM00_STD.R10 -> BM00_STD.R10ML (for 2/33 snames)
#> 		Read design (update if required!): ~/importomicscache/datasets/differentiation/differentiation.proteinGroups.Ratio.normalized.design.txt
#> 		Retain 33/33 samples: ~!subgroup %in% rm_subgroups
#> 	Log2 transform
#> 		Replace NaN -> NA for 121486/322674 values (in 5426/9778 features and 33/33 samples)
#> 		Log2 transform
#> 	Read: ~/importomicscache/datasets/differentiation/differentiation.phosphoSites.txt
#> 	Prepare samples
#> 		Standardize snames: Ratio M/L normalized STD(L).EM00(M).EM01(H).R1  ->  STD(L).EM00(M).EM01(H).R1{M/L}
#> 		Demultiplex snames: STD(L).EM00(M).EM01(H).R1{M/L}  ->  EM00_STD.R1
#> 		Uniquify snames: BM00_STD.R10 -> BM00_STD.R10ML (for 2/33 snames)
#> 		Read design (update if required!): ~/importomicscache/datasets/differentiation/differentiation.proteinGroups.Ratio.normalized.design.txt
#> 		Retain 33/33 samples: ~!subgroup %in% rm_subgroups
#> 	Log2 transform
#> 		Replace NaN -> NA for 17639/465498 values (in 1291/14106 features and 33/33 samples)
#> 		Log2 transform
#> 	Filter features
#> 		Retain 13968/14106 features: ~Reverse != "+"
#> 		Retain 13826/13968 features: contaminant != '+'
#> 		Retain 9691/13826 features: non-zero, non-NA, and non-NaN for some sample
#> 		Retain 7510/9691 features: ~`Localization prob` >= min_localization_prob
#> 		Add occupancies(phospho) = exprs(phospho) - exprs(proteins)
#> Aggregate function missing, defaulting to 'length'
#> 	Transform exprs
exprs(object)[1:3, 1:3]

#>   EM00_STD.R1 EM01_STD.R1 EM01_EM00.R1
#> 0          NA          NA           NA
#> 1   -0.874825  -0.5401278     3.652486
#> 2   -1.594618  -1.3539111     3.631454
occupancies(object)[1:3, 1:3]

#>   EM00_STD.R1 EM01_STD.R1 EM01_EM00.R1
#> 0           1           1            1
#> 1           1           1            1
#> 2           1           1            1
